item.description:
RSVP by Friday, April 9 - we need to make a reservation if we are more than 5 attendees.

Directions and info: Alchemist Lounge website

Casual chic is the word at the Alchemist, a locally owned restaurant and pub in Jamaica Plain. Spend a relaxing hour or two in comfort while enjoying live blues and the terrific menu. Trust me, the food is great--it's my local neighborhood pub and I'm a regular! There is a full bar to provide the traditional brunch beverages of mimosas or Bloody Marys (or Virgin Marys if you prefer).

There is free parking in the lot at Centre St. and Spring Park Ave.
DO NOT PARK ON MORAINE STREET - if you block a driveway, you WILL be towed.
MBTA: Bus 39 or 41.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the bar (on the LHS as you enter thru the front door).
item.name: Blues Brunch @ The Alchemist Lounge in JP
